content: > a free version of this pattern will be available on my website 1 > this pattern includes video support and can be purchased along with ad-free videos and a course to help you learn how to work in the round you can find all the details on my website 2 **maya cardigan** i ve always loved the classic granny stitch hexagon cardigans that are so popular and that inspired me to create my own version in tunisian crochet if you aren t familiar with this style of cardigans you might be surprised to learn that it s made from just two hexagons one of the best features of this design is the seamless join achieved by grafting tunisian knit stitches this cardigan is also special to me as it marks my first cardigan design if you re comfortable working in the round you ll find this project easy and enjoyable let s dive in and get started **what to expect in this pattern** 1 general instructions including supplies needed and video tutorials 2 written instructions 5 support videos **technique and difficulty** intermediate - this pattern assumes you are familiar with the basics of starting and finishing a tunisian crochet project as well as working in the round if you re new to tunisian-in-the-round consider taking the course a beginner s guide to tunisian-in-the-round 4 before starting this cardigan **sizes** xs s/m l/xl 2x/ 3x 4x/5x **yarn** i made my cardigan with knitpicks brava worsted yarn in colors black sienna brindle almond and cream **hook** for this cardigan i built a double-ended hook using two hooks - 8 mm l - 11 for the forward pass - 6 5 mm k - 10 5 for the return pass you could also use one with two hooks of the same size at both ends if you are planning to add the bottom extension which is optional to this pattern you will also need an 8 mm l-11 hook with a cable since that part is worked flat **facebook group** join the knitterknotter hangout group on facebook 5 **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with **@knitterknotter #knitterknotter #mayacardigan** so that i can find them **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com 1 https //knitterknotter com/maya-hexagon-cardigan-free-pattern/ 2 https //knitterknotter com/maya-hexagon-cardigan-cal-2024/#purchasethepdf 3 https //www facebook com/groups/661371943880506 4 https //knitterknotter thrivecart com/a-beginners-guide-to-titr/ 5 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout
